data.pageDesc: This is Match the column activity Page. Containing four drop down elements. Please match corect option and click submit.
data.pageText: Julie ends her call with James and walks out of her office to find Judy rushing to the printer to collect her documents. Judy picks up her documents but finds that the text is faded. She then overhears some other staff complaining about other printer problems.

pageTexts.pageText: Letâ€™s take a look at the problems and help Judy to identify appropriate solutions.
Select the correct answers. Then, select Submit to review feedback.

option.pageText: Check if there is a problem with a corrupted print driver.
Check if fuser is dirty or broken.
Check if there is a problem with the wrong printer driver.

optionGroup.pageText: Improper characters are printed on the page.

option.pageText: Check if the fuser needs to be replaced.
Consult the user manual for the type of cabling that is suggested.

optionGroup.pageText: Printing is smeared and the toner is not adhering to the paper.

option.pageText: Check if the fuser is dirty or broken.
Check if the fuser is empty.

feedback.title: Generic Feedback Heading
feedback.content: This is the Generic Feedback content.

feedback.title: Correct!
feedback.content: You have selected the correct answers. However, do remember that these answers may not be the only correct answer and there could be other additional steps.

feedback.title: Correct!
feedback.content: You have selected the correct answers. However, do remember that these answers may not be the only correct answer and there could be other additional steps.

feedback.title: Incorrect.
feedback.content: You have not selected the correct answers. Please try again.

feedback.title: Incorrect.
feedback.content:
You have not selected the correct answers.

The correct answers are:

Statements Correct Answers
The printer does not print. Check if the printer is selected or online.
Improper characters are printed on the page. Check if the correct printer driver is installed.
Printing is smeared and the toner is not adhering to the paper. Check if the fuser is dirty or broken.
Toner has spilled from the laser printer. Use a vacuum specially designed to clean toner spills.

STRAND.NAME: Opening the call
STRAND.RANGE: You did not do a good job of building rapport with the prospect and understanding his needs.
You did not do a good job of building rapport with the prospect and understanding his needs.
You did a great job of building rapport with the prospect and establishing his needs and requirements.
You did a super job of building rapport with the prospect and establishing his needs and requirements.

STRAND.NAME: Presenting solution
STRAND.RANGE: You did not do well in mapping the product's features with the prospect's needs. You were also not able to illustrate the product's benefits and features.
You could have done a better job of mapping the product's features with customer's needs. You should have also tried to illustrate the product benefits and answer product-related queries.
You did a great job of mapping the product features to prospect's needs, illustrating how the product works, and explaining benefits.
You were spot on in mapping the product features to prospect's needs, illustrating how the product works, and explaining benefits.

STRAND.NAME: Handling objection
STRAND.RANGE: You were not able to handle the prospect's objections satisfactorily and address them in a meaningful manner.
You were not able to do a good job of handling the prospect's objections satisfactorily. As a result, you couldn't address them in a meaningful manner.
You acknowledged the prospect's objections and addressed them, giving the prospect the confidence to say yes to the sale.
You acknowledged the prospect's objections and addressed them, giving the prospect the confidence to say yes to the sale.

STRAND.NAME: Closing the sale
STRAND.RANGE: You did not do a good job at the end of the interaction. In spite of identifying the appropriate solution and eliminating objections, you were not able to confirm the final sale.
You could have done a better job at the end of the interaction. In spite of identifying the appropriate solution and eliminating objections, you were not able to confirm the final sale.
You did a good job at the end of the interaction. Since you identified the appropriate solution and eliminated all the customer's objections, you were able to confirm the final sale.
You did a super job at the end of the interaction. Since you identified the appropriate solution and eliminated all the customer's objections, you were able to confirm the final sale.

STRAND.NAME: Overall Sales Pitch
STRAND.RANGE:
You did not grab the sales opportunity. Next time, try to understand the customer's needs to provide the right solution.
Click the tabs on the right to view how you have done in each of the key parameters. Sharpen your product knowledge and seling skills, and then replay the simulation.

You did not do a great job with this sales opportunity. Next time, use your product knowledge and understanding of the customer's needs to close the sale.
Click the tabs on the right to view how you have done in each of the key parameters. Then please replay the simulation.

You did well with this sales opportunity, but could have done even better. You were able to use your product knowledge and understanding of the customer's needs.
Click the tabs on the right to view how you have done in each of the key parameters. You can further improve your score by replaying the simulation.

You did an excellent job with this sales opportunity. You were able to use your financial knowledge and understanding of the customer's needs to close the sale. That was a WOW experience for the customer.
Click the tabs on the right to view how you have done in each of the key parameters.
